nodes.text: Cora Vessora was a female witch from an unidentified planet. The Jedi wished for her to join their ranks, but she refused to join them or the Sith. The Sith retaliated by killing her loved ones while the Jedi idly stood by and did nothing. Vessora vowed revenge on both parties, and her story was later put into the form of an opera piece titled The Cantata of Cora Vessora.
